pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal Bayesian Modelling Using R // Fits, spatially predicts and temporally forecasts large amounts of space-time data using [1] Bayesian Gaussian Process (GP) Models, [2] Bayesian Auto-Regressive (AR) Models, and [3] Bayesian Gaussian Predictive Processes (GPP) based AR Models for spatio-temporal big-n problems. Version 3.0-0 provides truncated models for [1] and [3].
